"IF I HAD YOUR SMILE, I WOULD FUCK IT"

Stacey and I arrive at our apartment some time around 1am in our normal slightly drunk, lazy fashion. As soon as we walk in the front door, we notice that every single article that belongs in the bathroom has been dumped into the middle of the living room (down to the toilet plunger and shower caddy). 
 
 "Oh God, Dessa is home."
 
 Stacey and I shrug it off, deciding to sit down and watch some TV in the living room, floor completely littered with haphazard bathroom items. Around 2 minutes later, the lovely Dessa emerges from her room. Attempting to avoid any chance of conflict, I pretend that I don't notice her presence. She's done some pretty insane shit in the past, and I am not particularly looking for another night of crazy.
 
 Unfortunately, THIS NIGHT IS SPECIAL: 
 
 Dessa immediately begins screaming (out of fucking nowhere) telling Stacey and I that "we must leave the apartment immediately". She justifies this by telling us that we are "the children of Satan" and are tainted and evil beings. Fucked up. Stacey and I react with a resounding "W H A T THE FUUUCCK????" Dessa then informs us that our apartment is "a house of god, and we must LEAVE IMMEDIATELY or we will be rebuked in the name of the lord Jesus." Stacey and I are shocked and appalled, and a bit of awkward laughter crops up. I mean, we knew Dessa was crazy, but COME THE FUCK ON. Dessa begins trailing me around the apartment, gesticulating and ranting about how I am the spawn of Satan.
 
 I do my best to avoid her, which is somewhat difficult seeing as she's inches from my face screaming about the power of Jesus, and how I will be smitten by our lord and savior. I say something along the lines of ''That's great, Dessa" (somewhat worried by now) and begin to tentatively place the bathroom items back in the bathroom. As soon as I begin to walk past Dessa with the toilet plunger, she makes a sudden and wild grab for it, declaring: ''THIS FILTH MAY NOT PASS THE THRESHOLD".
 .....WHAT???? threshold??????iWhat the fuck is going on? Dessa gets a wild look in her eye and accosts me for the plunger. She then begins waving it wildly, slinging toilet water around the living room and yelling some crazy shit about Jesus and filth and who the fuck else knows what else. Stacey has some bed sheets in the living room, which Dessa attacks with the plunger, chanting some more wild shit about Jesus. Dessa then scampers outside with the plunger whilst yelling about its evil qualities. By this time, I'm laughing my ass off because THIS shit is FUCKED UP. I make an attempt to place a trash can back in the bathroom. As soon as I touch the bathroom door knob I notice that there is some WEIRD FUCKING SUBSTANCE on it.
 
 Dessa (who has apparently returned from her wild outdoor adventure) exclaims: ''what did you just touch?"
 
 I dont say anything.
 
 I have no idea what I just put my hand in; it feels cold, and I'm getting somewhat weirded out and annoyed (the funny had begun to wear off by this point). Dessa then informs me that I am "going to be gone soon", which (needless to say) is a really fucking weird thing to tell someone. I'm thinking to myself "I hope she didn't fucking Ricin the door handle". I keep my cool and kind of laugh it off, washing my tainted hand thoroughly. At this point, I start up on an energy drink whilst Dessa follows Stacey and I around the apartment, repeating her "evil spawn of satan'' schtick.
 
 I'm fed up and decide to turn the TV on, thinking Dessa will get bored, go away, shut up, all of the above. As soon as the thing goes on, she turns it off and screeches at me. I shrug and turn it back on, as I'm the one with the remote. She rips the cord out of the wall. I grab my kodak and begin filming her insanity. This shit has gone WAYY TOO FAR. As soon as she notices that I am recording her, her fucked up personality suddenly 180s and she begins making a strange attempt to act normal. This is possibly even weirder than her regular psychotic nature. Everything that she had said earlier she refutes, and at some point she begins asking why Stacey and I had thrown stuff around the apartment. I decide to reattach the TV cord. I move the TV away from the wall, which prompts Dessa to stand creepishly close to me. She begins telling me that ''I shouldn't mess around behind the TV, that's the landlord's property etc". I laugh nervously and ask her if she remembers pulling the cord out of the wall. She rants some more. I finally manage to fix the TV. Dessa disappears into the back of the apartment, rustling around in her room for about 5 minutes. When she re-emerges.........SHE'S HOLDING A FUCKING TAMBOURINE WITH A FUCKING JESUS CROSS ON THE FRONT OF IT. At this point, I'm like ''oh my god, someone call the fucking loony bin." She stands in front of the TV in a position that makes her look like some kind of a fucked up holocaust victim. I begin photographing the moment, laughing nervously and asking Dessa why we aren't allowed to watch TV. She doesn't respond in any logical way. Stacey is now on the phone with her cousin (who's a cop) asking what the fuck to do. Dessa begins rebuking us again, and I turn the TV back on. I stop recording for a bit. Dessa rips the cord out of the wall for the second time, and runs off to her room with both the cord and the remote control. I figure she's done being a psycho for the night, so I cut my losses and begin surfing the web and listening to music on my headphones.
 
 
 I'm sitting on the couch listening to a good Hernan Cattaneo set since I can't even fucking watch TV in my own apartment. I notice a disturbance at the back of the apartment, and Dessa enters the living room YET AGAIN, standing directly in front of the TV. She begins to sing a hymn loudly and dance theatrically with her fucking god-forsaken Jesus tambourine, which she is STILL HOLDING. I ignore her and keep my headphones on. As it seems she is not getting enough attention, PSYCHO walks over and STANDS DIRECTLY ABOVE ME, pretty much leaning against my left leg, and BANGING THAT FUCKING TAMBOURINE IN MY FACE. I calmly tell her to quit standing over me, and she rebukes me in the name of Jesus, YET AGAIN.
 
 At this point, I'm waiting for Ashton Kutcher to jump out and yell ''YOU GOT PUNK'D!!!!!!". Unfortunately, this doesn't happen. My willpower resources that help me hold back my "kill switch" are running dangerously low. I want to rip her fucking head off with every thread of my being. This goes on for like 2 hours longer. 2 more fucking hours.
 
 2 HOURS LATER:
 
 Dessa finally stops chanting and retires to her room for a third or fourth or I dont even know how many fucking times she's come out to make me want to MURDER HER. Stacey and I figure it's safe to finally watch some TV. Before we even turn the thing on, Dessa bursts out of her room in some type of an insane rage. At this point, I'm sitting on the arm of the sofa closest to the front door discussing the "little problem'' with Stacey. We do our best to ignore her presence. Dessa storms towards the couch, opens the front door and smashes it into my shoulder. She begins screeching: ''GET OUT, GET OUT, IN THE NAME OF THE LORD BLAHBLAHBLAH GET OUT". Finally pissed off enough to take some physical action, I say something along the lines of ''I WILL FUCKING KILL YOU IF YOU DONT STEP AWAY. YOU DONT WANT TO DIE TONIGHT, DO YOU?" She smashes the door into me again, and I push it back into her. She loses her balance, and begins screaming about how she now has ''bruises on her arms" and that she will file assault charges.....and you know what? IT GETS WORSE.
 
 This is around the time when Dessa decides to dial 911.....
 
 Stacey and I are in blatant shock and disbelief. Did she really dial just 911? Was she actually talking to cops? WHY did she dial 911? Are the cops actually coming...? and you know what? 
 
 
 10 minutes later....
 
 6 HEAVILY ARMED MEN (what looks to me like a god damn SWAT team) show up at our apartment at 4 IN THE FUCKING MORNING. Stacey and I are in a hazy disbelief, completely mystified by the sheer stupidity of the night's events. Dessa is screaming wildly while the brigade of police men watch in concern, fascination, and disgust. One of the cops escorts Stacey and I to a quiet area of the apartment, asking us if Dessa is on (or should be on) any meds that we are aware of. Neither of us know, as it's virtually impossible to have a normal conversation with this THING that we live with. The cop tells us that he's very sorry for us, and ceases questioning. Dessa is still upstairs with the 4 or 5 other guys who look bored and annoyed. The cops eventually leave. Seemingly exhausted by her crazy ass antics, Dessa wordlessly retires to her room (for good this time) after that fucked up grand finale.
 
 THE NEXT DAY
 
 After much debate, Stacey and I decide to make a report at the local police precinct, since Dessa has done damage to property owned by the landlord (throwing out random shit that didn't belong to her).
 
 Stacey and I come home and decide to watch some TV.
 
 OH MY FUCK, BAD IDEA. Dessa immediately scampers out of her room (as if she's fucking wired to the TV) accosting me for the remote control. She clutches it in her ugly talons, running outside with it and doing god knows what with it (it's still missing). In a swift and impulsive motion, I slam the front door and lock it. Take that, stupid bitch. After like 2 minutes, someone opens the door. I don't know where Dessa is.
 
 DESSA CALLS THE POLICE.
 
 More cops show up, and for some reason an ambulance is included in the mix...WHAT   THE   FUCK.
 Dessa begins raving again, and the police ask her if she would like to ''come with them". I'm fucking begging Yahweh that they'll haul her bitch ass to an asylum where she belongs. Unfortunately, they aren't legally allowed to take her away unless she lashes out at THEM directly. The cops leave, exasperated and annoyed. Dessa leaves the apartment. Good riddance.
 
 After a few hours, Dessa returns to the apartment flanked by two fat old women. What the fuck? She enters the apartment and informs us that we will be undergoing a religious intervention. By this time, I've gathered that the two women are church workers, here to help us undergo a spiritual transformation. Fucked up. Every tenant in the apartment (Stacey, Owen, Dessa, Me) are sat down by these women to have some sort of a discussion about the situation. Surprisingly, these church people seem almost half-reasonable (at least in comparison to Dessa, the horrendously crazy counterpart). We discuss the events of the previous night, and attempt to make some compromise. At one point, I notice that the conversation is going ABSOLUTELY FUCKING NOWHERE, due to the obvious fact that mental patients are virtually impossible to reason with. I straight up leave the room in the middle of it all to go take a much-needed nap.
 
 
 DESSA BLEACHES THE WALLS......
so who the hell else is back in said hometown?
Lately I've taken a liking to expired sour cream.

lolololololast night:

Got kicked out of upstairs, because I took 3 benadryl and passed out on the couch because I'm a little sick. My annoying-ass guy roommate who's anal as fuck is having this party later and was all like ''YOU HAVE TO GET OUT MY FAMILY IS COMING OVER BLAHBLAHBLAHBLAH"  so I was like  ok okkkkkkk and went downstairs for like 5 minutes. Then he gives me this stupid lecture about mess and space and blah blah and I'm like ''THIS IS ALL YOUR STUFF, I DONT HAVE ANYTHING BUT THIS BOX''.  Then he's all ''what is this box?" and I'm all like ''dude it's my stuff leave it there'' and he's like ''I'm putting it in your room" and I'm like ''just put it in the corner'' so he puts it in my room and ALL HIIS STUFF IS EVERYWHERE AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
AHHHHHHHH
AHHHHHHHHHHhhh
AHHHHHHHHHHHH

so like I'm not allowed to have any of my stuff anywhere, but he's allowed to have his shit ABSOLUTELY EVERYWHERE.

so we go to this bar and hang out and blahblah. so I'm like leaving right and I put my bike chain around my waist (my bike chain key is attached to my wallet) and I specifically remind myself ''PUT YOUR WALLET IN YOUR BACKPACK''  so I put my wallet in my backpack and AHHHH so like

so I lock myself in the bathroom lol and my cool roommate who's also wasted as fuck comes in and steals my phone so I'm like CRAZY DRUNK PISSED and tackle her  into the bathtub LOL and pin her with my knee

and I'm like ''GIVE IT BACK AND GET THE FUCK OUT, GET THE FUCK OUT GET THE FUCK OUT" and so like I get my phone back and yank her out of the bathtub and throw her against the wall outside of the bathroom and lock it again

It's FIXED..... and it snowed.




My shoulder is also starting to look less fucked up.

Random.

It makes me want to die....

and LIVE.

I am annoyed.

I am annoyed.

I am annoyed.


fuck this.
This is a fucked up dream. It has to be.

Did a good job on my first project. Teacher liked it.

Things are looking up-ish.
My sunglasses are fucking awesome.

I'm moving to New York on the 18th. I have no idea what I'm taking, and no place to live.

Nonetheless, it's ok. The decision to move was made on a complete whim.

It'll give me something to do. I'm bored.

Today I was dragged to see ''Paprika", that new Satoshi KON film. I guess I'll say (without spoiling the film for whoever reads this) that I wanted all the characters to wake up in the end at....say..... an office-party-gone-awry, thinking: "What the fuck was IN THAT CANDY BOWL???? LSD-25??!?!??!" And yeah, it was. Trippy ass movie.

Anyways. I suppose I haven't updated in quite some time....

I worked for awhile this summer.
My fantastic employment took place at an art shipping and storage company in the warehouse/asian prostitute district of Dallas. It was a boring, albeit decent job. I spent most of my time creating spreadsheets in microsoft excel, which was fairly suicide-inducing. My boss was a cool guy, although I'm pretty sure he thought I was a complete moron. He was actually dead-on in assuming this, seeing as I'm non-functional as a human being between 5AM and 3PM (this was an 8 to 5 job). The girl who did the front-desk job before me (and kind of trained me, I suppose) was nice, funny, nice. She'd type, I'd type, I'd give her faxes and shit. Fantastic relationship. Also, there was a whole group of people who did the actual art-handler work (mostly guys). Whenever they weren't working, they'd sit in the office and smoke, and I'd sit at the desk and feel awkward. They were all A-OK, and just kind of did whatever.  OH, yes....and then...

There was that guy.....yeah that GUYYYYY......

I started stalking him.

Why?

It started out as obsessive annoyance. I think his first words to me were.....something condescending? I was a very....reluctant employee. Reluctant to be social, that is. Because I had to work at the front desk, I was a fairly easy target for silly bullshit. I'd always know when that guy was coming into the office, because he was one of those people who slams around, and is always making some kind of racket. I'd sit at the desk and cringe....."Oh god, please, no stupid questions/comments/remarks...Just...don't....look......up...."

At some point he started making fun of my eyebrows. He said something really strange to me, along the lines of: ''Your eyebrows are distracting. Black and distracting." Who the FUCK says that? I'd glance at him out of the corner of my eye and continue typing, and he'd apologize for being a dick. Of course, I had no response for him. Who would? Although I realized that he was just the good old jerk-at-work type, I was still fucking annoyed sometimes.

Being really really really hideously bored does strange things to me. Because work was pretty mundane, I'd spend way too much time fantasizing about ruining this guy's life. Out of the aforementioned boredom, I started finding stuff out about him: standard things, like where he lives, email, age, blah blah. Just stuff.  After a while, I realized "Hey! This is pretty sick!" and quit digging.

LOWDOWN TIME:

SO, he was in his 30's. I won't provide a name. Chronic sunglasses-wearer, which was actually a huge source of annoyance. I could never tell if he was actually talking in my direction because all I could see were his God-forsaken black shiny shades. Otherwise, he was a regular-looking guy. Brown hair, about, ohhh.....I'd say 5'10''? Tannish skin, probably from working outside all the time, and the smile of a real jerk-ass. For the most part, a regular voice, although he talked with this chronicly-hungover drunken slur. A lot of times when he'd call the office, I'd pick up the phone and I wouldn't understand what the fuck he was trying to tell me. I guess I could also add that he was one of those people who you would automatically assume has brown eyes, just by looking at the rest of him, and by taking into account that he never took off his damn sunglasses. He seemed really arrogant, almost fascinatingly so. I also wondered on a regular basis how many times he got fucked up beyond comprehension in his lifetime. On any occasion that he actually got me to talk, anything I'd say about myself was complete and total bullshit.

I quit working at said art shipping-and-handling place when my employers found out I was going to college out of state in the fall. I actually lied about that in the first place. The job was too far away anyways.

Moral of the story: DON'T FUCKING HIRE ME.

Near the end of the short span of time I worked there, that annoying guy came up to my desk to ask me when my last day was. Without looking up from my computer work, I shrugged and replied: ''Tuesday". He then asked me (in his typical jerky tone) "but what DAY is that?" I was reluctant to respond. This time, however, he had taken the damn sunglasses off and I could tell he was actually talking to me. I glanced up from my work, and all I could muster was a weak ''I don't know''.

His eyes were so God damn clear gorgeous blue.

I went to AKON as a fucked up anime face that I made out of a note card, markers, and some duct tape.....coupled with aviators. Probably 50 people came up and asked to photograph me in my ''costume".

Go figure.

Everyone wants to kill a large number of people, at one time, with one or two automatic weapons.


Do you follow me?

Spring break in New York was freezing cold, and pleasantly warm. I suppose this is delayed. There was too much to write about, and I never found a way to do it. I remember very little.

Today I realized:

I've finally let go.

Thanks for all the ibuprofen, and sorry.


Sayonara, you.

I think if I got a pogo stick, I would feel human again.

....................................

HAHA HA HAHA HA HA HA HA HA HAHAHAH HAHA.............

Hilariously fucked up.

I am going to drown.

I got some kind of weird ass hair cut. I don't know whether or not I like it. I think I may slice at it myself sometime later (tonight). Yeah, I think I hate it.

Oh, and New York in exactly a week. It's insane how time flies. I have a 15-page english paper due in a few days. I haven't really done anything....and I have a 2 page french composition to write as well. Haven't done that either. Ah, procrastination! You pistol-whip me every time I have something time-consuming to do. That's it. IT.
Valentines day was supremely fucked up. That is all.

Today I almost drove off of an overpass.....


on purpose.


That can't be good.

Wishlist

1) new razor blades
2) Sex change surgery

I feel as if I'm at some sort of breaking point. I dont like where this is going.

Might as well go down with it.

I have to take a mandatory religion class this semester, which is like swallowing a napalm grenade.

NOTES! :


and then some good ole' english notes!:



I have...... uhhhhhmmmmm..... issues with note taking.
I am an incredibly attentive college student, especially in english class.....

I need to write about college because I'm the only fag out there who hasn't.

so I'm in college..... Doing my work...work...work. 

Right now, life is .....surreal. I can't think of any other way to put it. I'm kind of just...floating around in limbo as it seems, feeling  absolutely nothing. I'm learning a lot, education-wise, which is okay.

Otherwise, I'm completely blank. I dont know what else to think. I think I'm blocking out a lot of it. College.....

It's kind of nice I suppose. I have no further opinion.

Went journalstalking, and found some really dandy-ass quiz/survey type thing, and it's funny enough to where I will fill it out....


 LOLZ....

I've never done surveys, but I need something to fill the time gap between my last entry and another entry I'll probably write in........a long time? hah I dont know. I am bad at livejournalizing.

ok commence dandy-ass survey:

SURVEY

Sunset or moonlight?:HAhaahahah omg....

and finally, the olde question..what do you think about the survey??:hahaha wtf....

Dandy ass survey complete.

Today I was in the dorm bathrooms. I had just washed my hands, but alas! The paper towels were gone! (okay, when I took these pictures they had been replaced)


This is the seemingly ''normal'' storage room door.


The door's unlocked, so there must be paper towels inside!


Something doesn't seem right.....


ok. I even I didn't expect this.....


Wow. If I ever like....accidentally brutally murdered someone....I have a perfect storage area. This is so cool that it threw me on ice, cut out my kidneys, and sold them on ebay!


This hole is way cool!

I still want my fucking paper towels.....

Today/night was good. I did things.

Actually, nights are lived like days, and days are lived like nights. I quit sleeping. So I was sitting here at this desk at the edge where the printer angles off the tabletop. There was a glass cat lying there sideways. I never remembered having a glass garage-sale looking cat.  When I went to set it upright, my sister's boyfriend snatched it up. It was his pipe....but it sure did look like a glass cat. I smell like a stoner. Did some more drawing, but nothing really worth posting. I revised that naked Raskolnikov guy. The flameuererotic one. Behold the bootleg-ass photoshop skillz. under cut yo.
 

 


Now with IMPROVED gayness!!!!
His story: Begin at a hotel. Well, 2 hotels in the same building, actually. They share a building, but have different elevators and seperate doors, which are on opposite sides of the hall. The good hotel is older, and has tan carpet and bigger elevators. Everything in relation to the nice hotel is on the right, whereas the rest of the hotel is on the left. Or is it the other way around? In any case, keys are not used to get into the rooms of the nice hotel (or at least when I went there). We were given the entire doorknob, which fit into a hole in the door. Heavy brass knobs, and the rooms click right open! I went there once, a very very long time ago --to the nice hotel, but I don't remember much of anything. I want to go back there someday.  Wait for rest. busy.
I also wanted to add:


 

I am playing the game

the one that will take me to my end.
